sentences: Maelyn Jarmon (born December 8, 1992) is an American folk singer.
In 2019, Maelyn Jarmon entered the sixteenth season of The Voice.
She made it to the finale and was announced as the winner on May 21, 2019.
On July 4, 2019, she sang the national anthem at A Capitol Fourth.
Maelyn grew up in Frisco, TX and lived in NYC for 9 years before receiving an invitation to audition for Season 16 of The Voice.
